segments.text: Strange looking handle on that coffee mug , isn't it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We submitted two designs to our buyers , this one and one with the mug indented to form a grip . They chose this one .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What's the advantage ? Price , I suppose .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , this type cleans better , no crevices between the body and handle joint .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What deliveries are you quoting nowadays on orders such as ours ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We can make shipment within one month from receipt of order .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You don't do much in porcelain tiles and ornaments , do you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We do a fair amount in tiles and in insulators for electrical appliances . But kitchenware and tableware are our mainlines .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . Well , keep up the good work . See you later .
segments.speaker: S1
